Things to do in Osaka

Uncover Osaka's vibrant essence! Immerse yourself in the exhilarating rides and iconic characters at Universal Studios Japan, a world-class entertainment hub. Explore the historical grandeur of Osaka Castle, a majestic landmark offering insights into Japan's rich past. Savor the legendary street food and electric nightlife of Dotonbori. Osaka offers diverse, captivating experiences for every traveler.

See more

Things to do in Osaka

Uncover Osaka's vibrant essence! Immerse yourself in the exhilarating rides and iconic characters at Universal Studios Japan, a world-class entertainment hub. Explore the historical grandeur of Osaka Castle, a majestic landmark offering insights into Japan's rich past. Savor the legendary street food and electric nightlife of Dotonbori. Osaka offers diverse, captivating experiences for every traveler.

Things to do in Osaka

Uncover Osaka's vibrant essence! Immerse yourself in the exhilarating rides and iconic characters at Universal Studios Japan, a world-class entertainment hub. Explore the historical grandeur of Osaka Castle, a majestic landmark offering insights into Japan's rich past. Savor the legendary street food and electric nightlife of Dotonbori. Osaka offers diverse, captivating experiences for every traveler.

Reviews of Osaka activities

Edna ****
2025-12-27 01:09:58
Fantastic 5.0
We bought a 2 day pass and we had enjoyable time. We arrive around 9am and left around 7pm on mid December. We were able to enter the place smoothly without waiting. Morning crowd is more manageable but by afternoon the place is more crowded. There were times which the Super Nintendo World needed time entry. Download the USJ app and scan your studio passes into the app before hand and while you are in the park you can get a time entry to enter SNW. I would recommend if can afford, buy express pass for popular rides like Minecart, MarioCart, Forbidden Journey, Hollywood Dream, Jurassic and Jaws. Therr rides have longer waiting time and for Minecart I saw 210mins at one point!

Universal Studios Japan Studio Pass

best choice to get 2 days pass. easy to activate QR code for transport in metro. Day 1: Osaka castle, Kaiyodo Figurine museum, Toyotomi Stone wall museum, Gozafune (boat ride), Osaka museum of history.  Took metro to Tennoji area for the tsutenkako slide. Took metro to Dontobori and joined the Wonder cruise. Day 2: Osaka Umeda sky building Observatory, Tempozan Ferris wheel, Santa Maria Cruise, Glion museum

Warich **********
2025-12-17 15:21:20
Fantastic 5.0
teamLab Botanical Garden Osaka is a nighttime digital art experience that seamlessly blends real nature with light, color, and sound. The event is held in Nagai Botanical Garden, making the walk different from indoor teamLab exhibitions because you have to walk among trees, streams, and open spaces. Each installation changes according to the movement of the audience, creating a sense of participation and a mysterious, exploratory atmosphere. It is perfect for nighttime strolls and taking beautiful photos; the light reflecting off the nature creates a peaceful yet playful vibe. The disadvantage is that the walking distance is quite long, requiring considerable time and effort. Also, some sections of the path are dark, which may not be convenient for the elderly or those with mobility issues. Overall, it is a unique and impressive experience. If you like contemporary art and nighttime atmospheres, it is highly recommended not to miss it when visiting Osaka.

teamLab Botanical Garden Osaka Ticket

FAQs about Osaka

What are the top things to do in Osaka?

Here are the most popular things to do in Osaka:

  1. Universal Studios Japan Studio Pass - Visitors love the vibrant atmosphere of Universal Studios Japan, especially appreciating its unique themed areas like Super Nintendo World.
  2. Universal Studios Japan Express Pass - Guests consistently praise the Express Pass for significantly reducing wait times, allowing them to fully enjoy the park's thrilling rides and captivating shows.
  3. Osaka Amazing Pass - The Osaka Amazing Pass provides significant cost savings and great value, offering convenient unlimited metro access and skip-the-line entry to numerous popular attractions for an efficient city exploration.

What are the best activities or sights for families in Osaka?

For families visiting Osaka, consider these top activities and sights:

  1. Osaka Go Karting Experience by Akiba Kart - Families find the Osaka Go Karting Experience a highly exciting and unique way to explore the city, offering memorable fun and excellent safety measures with friendly guides.
  2. Kimono & Yukata Rental Experience in Osaka by Ouka Kimono - Families can enjoy a highly satisfying and enjoyable cultural experience by renting beautiful kimonos with professional service at Kimono Miyabi Asakusa Station, creating memorable moments.
